Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by California in 1971...
Injured on 4/24/1971 with a Stiff Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 4/18/1976 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/17/1976 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 6/1/1977 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/28/1978, off Gary Ross (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/9/1978, off Aurelio Lopez (NYY)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1978, hitting .283 with 8 HR, 54 RBI...
Injured on 7/16/1980 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1983, hitting .478 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/5/1984 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Injured on 9/29/1985 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/30/1986 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
